introduction.html:div: Edapt is a framework for Ecore model adaptation and instance migration.

preamble.html:div: Milestones are still to be scheduled.

target_environments.html:div: The target environment is the latest milestone release of Eclipse and EMF.

compatibility_with_previous_releases.html:div: No compatibility with previous releases is needed since there have been no previous releases.

theme.name: Migrate existing code to Eclipse SVN

description.html:div: The projects COPE and MetaPatch have to pass the IP-Review and be committed to SVN.

theme.name: Define a common infrastructure for model migration

description.html:div: The infrastructure has to be able to identify the version of EMF-Models independently of their serialization format. Then, there is a hook needed to prepare the meta model needed for this version. It should be possible to register transformations (independently of their transformation language). These transformations should be called automatically to migrate the model to the currently needed version.
